item.title: 新国标将禁止全隐藏式车门把手
item.guid: 新国标将禁止全隐藏式车门把手
item.description:
Recently, the Equipment Industry Department I of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology organized the National Automotive Standardization Technical Committee to initiate the formulation and revision of the mandatory national standard "Safety Technical Requirements for Automobile Door Handles" and three amendments. 近日，工业和信息化部装备工业一司组织全国汽车标准化技术委员会，启动了《汽车车门把手安全技术要求》强制性国家标准及三项修改单的制修订工作。

Currently, the draft for comments has been formed and is open for public feedback, with a deadline of November 22, 2025. 目前，征求意见稿已形成，并向社会公开征求意见，截止日期为 2025 年 11 月 22 日。

According to the draft for comments, the "Technical Requirements" section clearly stipulates: 根据征求意见稿，「技术要求」部分明确规定：

    Each door (excluding the tailgate) must be equipped with an external door handle that has a mechanical release function;

    After an accident such as the deployment of irreversible restraint devices or a power battery thermal event, the non-impact side door should be able to be opened via the external handle without the aid of tools ;

    The external door handle, in any state , should have a hand operating space of no less than 60 mm × 20 mm × 25 mm relative to the vehicle body surface;

    Each door (excluding the tailgate) must also be equipped with an internal door handle that has a mechanical release function; even if an electric internal handle is provided, a mechanical emergency release device must also be present.

The document also requires that the internal door handle should be located in a "position unobstructed by interior vehicle components" and be visually accessible from the occupant's position. 文件同时要求，车门内把手应位于「无车内构件遮挡的位置」，并在乘员位置直观可见。

It is reported that the drafting group surveyed door handle types from 20 enterprises and 63 vehicle models, and conducted experimental verification for electric door handles, covering mainstream designs in the current domestic market. 据悉，起草组调研了 20 家企业、63 款车型的车门把手型式，并针对电动式车门把手开展试验验证，涵盖了当前国内市场的主流设计。

This standard aims to "further regulate and enhance the safety of door handles, solidifying the baseline for automotive safety." 此次标准旨在「进一步规范和提升车门把手安全性，筑牢汽车安全底线」。

🔗 Full text of the draft for comments: https://www.miit.gov.cn/cms_files/filemanager/1226211233/attach/20259/ea9690c3304b47e08f58b3e32b8eef7a.pdf 🔗 征求意见稿全文： https://www.miit.gov.cn/cms_files/filemanager/1226211233/attach/20259/ea9690c3304b47e08f58b3e32b8eef7a.pdf

item.title: 苹果回应 iPhone 17 Pro「易刮花」质疑
item.guid: 苹果回应-iPhone-17-Pro「易刮花」质疑
item.description:
According to 9to5Mac, users recently reported on social media that iPhone 17 series display units showed scratches on the back, particularly concentrated in the MagSafe area, sparking a "scratchgate" discussion. 据 9to5Mac 报道，近期有用户在社交平台上反映 iPhone 17 系列展示机出现背部划痕，尤其集中在 MagSafe 区域，引发「刮痕门」讨论。

Apple responded that these marks are not actual scratches but "material transfer" caused by some aging MagSafe stands in retail stores during use, which can be removed by cleaning. Apple stated that it has begun replacing the relevant display stands. 苹果方面回应称，这些痕迹并非真正的划痕，而是零售店中部分老化的 MagSafe 支架在使用过程中产生的「材质转移」，用户可通过清洁去除。苹果表示，已着手更换相关展示支架。

Additionally, YouTube channel "JerryRigEverything" pointed out in its tests that the iPhone 17 Pro camera module lacks a chamfered design on its edges, making it more prone to wear. 此外，YouTube 频道「JerryRigEverything」在测试中指出，iPhone 17 Pro 相机模组边缘缺少倒角设计，更容易出现磨损。

In response, Apple explained that this area uses the same anodized aluminum process as other products, and while slight wear may occur with long-term use, overall durability meets strict testing standards. 对此，苹果解释称，该区域采用与其他产品相同的阳极氧化铝工艺，长期使用中可能会出现轻微磨损，但整体耐用性符合严格测试标准。

Apple emphasized that the iPhone 17 series uses "lightweight aerospace-grade 7000 series aluminum alloy" and is equipped with the new Ceramic Shield 2 front cover glass, significantly improving scratch resistance compared to the previous generation. Compared to the previous titanium body, the new design offers superior performance in heat dissipation and energy efficiency. 苹果强调 iPhone 17 系列采用「轻量化航天级 7000 系列铝合金」，并配备全新的 Ceramic Shield 2 前盖玻璃，抗刮性能较上一代显著提升。相比此前的钛金属机身，新设计在散热和能效表现上更为出色。

item.title: Tim Cook 造访日本宝可梦中心
item.guid: Tim-Cook-造访日本宝可梦中心
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple CEO Tim Cook uncharacteristically showed his "gamer" side during his trip to Japan. 昨天，苹果 CEO 库克在日本行程中罕见晒出「游戏玩家」一面。

He posted on social media platform X, stating that he met Pikachu in Japan, discussed application scenarios for Apple software features with developers, and experienced the new game "Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot" at Bandai Namco. He frankly said, "Japan is a gamer's paradise." 他在社交平台 X 上发文表示，自己在日本遇见了皮卡丘，与开发者交流了苹果软件功能的应用场景，并在万代南梦宫体验了《龙珠激战小队》这款新作。他直言「日本是游戏玩家的天堂」。

Notably, Takaya Imamura, former senior art director at Nintendo who participated in the development of titles such as "Star Fox," "F-ZERO," and "The Legend of Zelda," also reposted Cook's message. 值得注意的是，曾参与《星际火狐》《F-ZERO》《塞尔达传说》等作品开发的任天堂前资深美术总监今村孝矢也转发了库克的贴文。

Takaya Imamura revealed in a comment that "there seems to be a community within Apple specifically discussing Nintendo," and mentioned that he learned this news from an Apple employee at an event. 今村孝矢在评论中透露「苹果公司内部似乎存在一个专门讨论任天堂的社群」，并提到自己是在一次活动中从苹果员工口中得知这一消息的。

A netizen from the Japanese region commented: "A full day's schedule, for a 64-year-old, this level of mobility is astonishing." 日区有网友表示：「一整天日程拉满，对于一个 64 岁的人来说，这种机动性是惊人的」。

Cook's activities quickly sparked heated discussion, with related posts garnering over 258,000 views. Some in the comments joked, "Pikachu and iPhone collaboration is coming," while others focused on whether Apple would showcase more integration of Japanese local game titles with technologies like Metal and visionOS in future events. 库克的动态迅速引发热议，相关贴文浏览量已超过 25.8 万次，评论区中有人调侃「皮卡丘和 iPhone 的联动要来了」，也有人关注苹果是否会在未来的活动中更多展示日本本土游戏作品与 Metal、visionOS 等技术的结合。

item.title: 三星子公司哈曼将宝华韦健、天龙等品牌纳入麾下
item.guid: 三星子公司哈曼将宝华韦健、天龙等品牌纳入麾下
item.description:
According to Forbes, Harman International Industries, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Samsung Electronics, recently announced that it has officially completed the acquisition of Sound United, a Masimo company. 据福布斯报道，三星电子旗下全资子公司哈曼国际工业日前宣布，已正式完成对 Masimo 旗下 Sound United 的收购。

This transaction covers several well-known audio brands, including Bowers & Wilkins, Denon, Marantz, Polk Audio, Definitive Technology, HEOS, Classé, and Boston Acoustics. 此次交易涵盖多个知名音频品牌，包括宝华韦健、天龙、Marantz、Polk Audio、Definitive Technology、HEOS、Classé 以及 Boston Acoustics。

Harman stated that this acquisition will significantly expand its core audio business footprint, covering multiple areas such as home audio, amplifiers, Hi-Fi components, AVRs, headphones, and car audio. Harman 表示，此次收购将显著扩展其核心音频业务版图，覆盖家庭音响、功放、Hi-Fi 组件、AVR、耳机及车载音响等多个领域。

Dave Rogers, President of Harman Lifestyle Division, stated that this acquisition will bring new growth opportunities for both parties: Harman Lifestyle 部门总裁 Dave Rogers 称，本次收购将为双方带来新的增长机遇：

Sound United's brand portfolio, with its commitment to sound, innovation, and quality, aligns perfectly with Harman's values. This transaction brings new growth opportunities for both parties and will propel Harman to new heights in the global audio market.

According to official information, Sound United will continue to operate as an independent strategic business unit to maintain the tradition and characteristics of each brand, while leveraging Harman's global resources to achieve broader market coverage. 根据官方信息，Sound United 将作为独立战略业务单元继续运营，以保持各品牌的传统与特色，同时借助 Harman 的全球资源实现更广泛的市场覆盖。

item.title: 苹果获全域快门图像传感器专利
item.guid: 苹果获全域快门图像传感器专利
item.description:
The latest publicly disclosed patent documents show that Apple is developing an image sensor with global shutter capabilities. 最新公开的专利文件显示，苹果正在研发一款具备全局快门功能的图像传感器。

This technology can capture all pixels at the same moment, effectively avoiding common image distortion and jitter problems associated with rolling shutters. 该技术可在同一时刻捕捉所有像素，从而有效避免滚动快门常见的画面扭曲与抖动问题。

The patent description mentions that each pixel will contain a vertically stacked "buffer" that can simultaneously store light information at the moment of exposure, and then read it line by line to generate an image. Compared to traditional horizontal designs, Apple's vertical stacking solution can save more light-gathering space and reduce stray light interference. 专利描述中提到，每个像素内部将包含一个垂直堆叠的「缓冲区」，可在曝光瞬间同时存储光线信息，再逐行读取生成图像。相比传统横向设计，苹果的垂直堆叠方案能够节省更多采光空间，并减少杂散光干扰。

According to Apple's description of the patent, this technology can not only improve image quality in high-speed motion scenes but also enhance shooting effects in LED lighting environments, making it suitable for various devices such as smartphones, tablets, laptops, and security equipment. 据苹果对该专利的描述，这项技术不仅能提升高速运动场景下的画质，还能改善 LED 灯光环境中的拍摄效果，适用于智能手机、平板电脑、笔记本电脑以及安防设备等多种终端。

item.title: 追觅被曝强制员工投资，此前宣布造车造手机
item.guid: 追觅被曝强制员工投资，此前宣布造车造手机
item.description:
According to Yicai, social media posts are circulating claiming that Dreame Technology's fund has a situation where "employees are forced to co-invest and it is linked to an elimination mechanism." 据第一财经报道，社交媒体流传网帖称，追觅科技旗下基金存在「强制员工跟投并与淘汰机制挂钩」的情况。

Screenshots show phrases like "those who can't break even this month will continue to be eliminated" appearing in internal group chats, involving company executives. 截图显示，内部群聊中出现「这个月还不能破零的继续汰换」等表述，并涉及公司高管。

According to the rumored rules, the minimum investment for employees starts at 10,000 yuan, with HR collecting information and signing a mandate agreement. Fees and carry are handled at the main fund level. The equity of departing employees can be repurchased by relevant entities at a lower price. 根据网传规则，员工起投金额为 1 万元起，由 HR 收集信息并签署委托协议，费用和 Carry 在主基金层面处理。离职员工的权益可由相关主体以较低价格回购。

Dreame responded by stating that they are currently verifying the relevant situation. 追觅方面回应称，目前正在核实相关情况。

According to previous reports, Dreame Technology announced its entry into the automotive industry in August this year, aiming to create "the world's fastest car" and "benchmark against Bugatti Veyron," stating that it has already selected a site near a Tesla factory in Germany to build a plant; 据此前报道，追觅科技今年 8 月宣布进军汽车行业，目标打造「世界上速度最快的车」「对标布加迪威龙」，并称已在德国特斯拉工厂附近选址建厂；

In September, Dreame officially announced its high-end flagship phone, Dreame Space, claiming it "received hundreds of millions in overseas orders before even launching" and would "divide the market with Xiaomi and Huawei." 9 月，追觅又官宣高端旗舰手机 Dreame Space，「尚未上市便已获得亿元海外订单」「与小米华为三分天下」。

item.title: 高通 CEO：已见到 Google 正在研发的「安卓电脑」
item.guid: 高通-CEO：已见到-Google-正在研发的「安卓电脑」
item.description:
According to wccftech, at the recent Qualcomm Snapdragon Summit, Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon shared the stage with Rick Osterloh, Google's Senior Vice President of Devices & Services, revealing an interesting new development — an Android-powered PC is currently under development. 据 wccftech 报道，在近日召开的高通骁龙峰会上，高通 CEO Cristiano Amon 与 Google 设备与服务高级副总裁 Rick Osterloh 同台，透露了一个引人关注的新动向 —— 一款由 Android 驱动的 PC 正在研发中。

Amon said: "I have seen this device, it is incredible. It realizes the vision of mobile and PC convergence, and I can't wait to own one." Amon 表示：「我已经见过这款设备，它令人难以置信。它实现了移动与 PC 的融合愿景，我迫不及待想拥有一台。」

Osterloh emphasized that Google is collaborating with Qualcomm to create a new platform that combines PC and smartphone characteristics, bringing the Gemini model and a complete AI technology stack into the PC domain. Osterloh 则强调，Google 正与高通合作，打造一个兼具 PC 与智能手机特性的全新平台，并将 Gemini 模型及完整 AI 技术栈引入 PC 领域。

He pointed out: "This is also a new way for Android to cover all computing scenarios." 他指出：「这也是 Android 能够覆盖所有计算场景的一种新途径。」

Currently, Google has not announced the product name or specific specifications, but it is widely believed that this project could be a significant step towards the convergence of Android and Chrome OS. 目前，Google 并未公布产品名称或具体规格，但外界普遍认为该项目可能是 Android 与 Chrome OS 融合的重要一步。

As Android has gained experience on tablets and in desktop mode, expanding to the PC platform seems to be only a matter of time. However, no official release timeline has been provided yet. 随着 Android 已在平板和桌面模式上积累经验，扩展至 PC 平台似乎只是时间问题。不过，官方尚未给出发布时间表。

item.title: 高通携手生态伙伴发布「AI 加速计划」
item.guid: 高通携手生态伙伴发布「AI-加速计划」
item.description:
The 2025 Snapdragon Summit China opened yesterday in Beijing. 2025 骁龙峰会·中国昨天在北京开幕。

This year marks Qualcomm's 40th anniversary and its 30th year in China. The summit, themed "Sparkling Inspiration, Dragon's Spirit," showcased the latest AI technology breakthroughs across multiple terminals including smartphones, PCs, automobiles, XR, and IoT. 今年恰逢高通成立 40 周年、进入中国 30 周年，峰会以「灵光闪烁 有龙则灵」为主题，展示了智能手机、PC、汽车、XR、物联网等多终端的最新 AI 技术突破。

At the conference, Qualcomm announced the official launch of the "AI Acceleration Plan" with partners including China Telecom, China Mobile, China Unicom, Xiaomi, Honor, vivo, OPPO, and ZTE, aiming to promote the large-scale implementation of AI on the device side and unleash new capabilities and application scenarios for edge intelligence. 会上，高通宣布携手中国电信、中国移动、中国联通、小米、荣耀、vivo、OPPO、中兴通讯等合作伙伴正式启动「AI 加速计划」，旨在推动终端侧 AI 的规模化落地，释放边缘智能的新能力与应用场景。

Cristiano Amon, President and CEO of Qualcomm, stated that AI will become the new UI in the future, with six major trends driving industry development, including changes in computing architecture, model hybridization, and enhanced edge data relevance. Qualcomm hopes to make AI ubiquitous through the "AI Acceleration Plan," bringing personalized cross-terminal experiences to users. 高通公司总裁兼 CEO 安蒙表示，未来 AI 将成为新的 UI，六大趋势正在驱动产业发展，包括计算架构变革、模型混合化、边缘数据相关性增强等。高通希望通过「AI 加速计划」让 AI 无处不在，为用户带来跨终端的个性化体验。

item.title: 阿里云与英伟达联合推动具身智能应用落地
item.guid: 阿里云与英伟达联合推动具身智能应用落地
item.description:
At the 2025 Hangzhou Apsara Conference, Alibaba Cloud and NVIDIA announced a partnership in the field of Physical AI. 在 2025 杭州云栖大会上，阿里云与英伟达宣布在 Physical AI（物理 AI）领域达成合作。

Alibaba Cloud's AI platform PAI will fully integrate NVIDIA's Physical AI software stack, providing enterprise users with full-link platform services such as data preprocessing, simulation data generation, model training and evaluation, robot reinforcement learning, and simulation testing, aiming to further shorten the development cycle of applications like embodied AI and assisted driving. 阿里云人工智能平台 PAI 将全面集成英伟达 Physical AI 软件栈，为企业用户提供数据预处理、仿真数据生成、模型训练评估、机器人强化学习、仿真测试等全链路平台服务，旨在进一步缩短具身智能、辅助驾驶等应用的开发周期。

According to reports, Alibaba Cloud's AI platform PAI will introduce the full suite of software stacks including NVIDIA Isaac Sim, NVIDIA Isaac Lab, NVIDIA Cosmos, and Physical AI datasets, and combine them with Alibaba Cloud's big data and AI platform capabilities to form a full-link support system covering data preprocessing, simulation data generation, model training and evaluation, robot reinforcement learning, and simulation testing. 据介绍，阿里云人工智能平台 PAI 将引入 NVIDIA Isaac Sim、NVIDIA Isaac Lab、NVIDIA Cosmos 以及 Physical AI 数据集在内的全套软件栈，并结合阿里云大数据与 AI 平台能力，形成覆盖数据预处理、仿真数据生成、模型训练评估、机器人强化学习、仿真测试的全链路支撑体系。

Wu Yongming, Director and CEO of Alibaba Group, stated that in the future, there might be more agents and robots than the global population, working collaboratively with humans and profoundly impacting the real world. 阿里巴巴集团董事兼 CEO 吴泳铭表示，未来可能会出现数量超过全球人口的 Agent 和机器人，与人类协同工作，对真实世界产生深远影响。

He also emphasized that large models are the "next-generation operating system," and AI cloud is the "next-generation computer." 他同时强调，大模型是「下一代操作系统」，而 AI 云则是「下一代计算机」。

According to the plan, from the GenAI Year Zero in 2022 to 2032, the energy consumption scale of Alibaba Cloud's global data centers will increase tenfold. 根据规划，从 2022 年 GenAI 元年至 2032 年，阿里云全球数据中心的能耗规模将提升 10 倍。

item.title: 雷军回顾造车与造芯：「就像同时供家里两个孩子上大学」
item.guid: 雷军回顾造车与造芯：「就像同时供家里两个孩子上大学」
item.description:
Yesterday, Lei Jun teased his upcoming annual speech on social media and reviewed Xiaomi's decisions to enter car manufacturing and restart chip development, stating that it was "like simultaneously sending two children to college," almost betting the entire family fortune. 昨天，雷军在社交平台预热即将举行的年度演讲，并回顾了小米造车与重启造芯的决策，称当时「就像同时供家里两个孩子上大学」，几乎押上全部家底。

Furthermore, Lei Jun revealed in the speech teaser video released yesterday that car manufacturing and chip development were not individual efforts but relied on professional teams working collaboratively. 此外，雷军在昨天发布的演讲预热视频中透露，造车与造芯并非个人之力，而是依靠专业团队协同推进。

He also emphasized that multiple internal reviews are an important way to accumulate experience, stating, "Doing reviews well is very important experience." 他还强调，内部多次复盘是经验积累的重要方式，「把复盘干好，就是很重要的经验」。

Regarding capital investment, Lei Jun frankly stated, "We immediately invested 100 billion yuan, which was almost all the money we had on our books at the time." The entire company tightened its belt and fully supported this. 在资金投入方面，雷军直言「一上来就拍了一千个亿，这几乎是我们当时账面上所有的钱」，公司上下因此勒紧腰带，全力支持。

Speaking of strategic goals, Lei Jun stated that Xiaomi dares to benchmark itself against the strongest global competitors in the automotive and chip sectors. 谈及战略目标，雷军表示，小米在汽车和芯片领域敢于对标全球最强对手。

Daring to benchmark against the world's number one is a kind of courage. Only by benchmarking against and learning from the number one can one ultimately surpass the number one.

It is understood that Xiaomi will hold Lei Jun's annual speech at 7 PM on September 25th, with the theme "Change," revealing the stories behind Xiaomi's Xuanjie chip and Xiaomi Auto. In addition, the Xiaomi 17 series phones will also officially debut at this event. 据了解，小米将于 9 月 25 日晚 7 点举办雷军年度演讲，主题为「改变」，将揭秘小米玄戒芯片和小米汽车背后的故事。此外，小米 17 系列手机也将在本次活动中正式亮相。

item.title: 比亚迪祝小米 17 发布成功，雷军回应
item.guid: 比亚迪祝小米-17-发布成功，雷军回应
item.description:
BYD Auto posted on its official Weibo today, wishing Xiaomi 17 a successful launch. 比亚迪汽车今日在官方微博发文，祝小米 17 发布成功。

Shortly after the post was published, Lei Jun, founder of Xiaomi Group, responded in the comment section: "Sincerely thanks!" sparking heated discussion among netizens. 该动态发布后不久，小米集团创始人雷军在评论区回应：「真心感谢！」引发网友热议。

Some users in the comment section stated, "Chinese car companies, let's go global together," while others commented, "This is the vision of China's number one car company." 评论区中有用户表示「中国车企，一起走向世界」，也有网友称「这就是中国第一车企的格局」。

Some netizens mentioned that the second generation BYD Qin PLUS will also be released soon, coinciding with the launch of the Xiaomi 17 series, which sparked discussion. 有网友提到，比亚迪秦 PLUS 二代也将在近期发布，时间节点与小米 17 系列新品撞期，引发讨论。

It's worth noting that following BYD, several other official corporate accounts have successively posted content on Weibo wishing "Xiaomi 17 a successful launch," including car manufacturers such as Dongfeng Nissan, Dongfeng Motor, IM Motors, Changan Automobile, Changan Qiyuan, Li Auto, and Deepal. 值得一提的是，继比亚迪之后，又有多家企业官方账号相继在微博发表「祝小米 17 发布成功」相关内容，包括东风日产、东风汽车、智己汽车、长安汽车、长安启源、理想汽车、深蓝汽车等车企。

In addition, brands such as Tmall, JD.com, Genki Forest, Three Squirrels, SF City Express, and Harper's Bazaar have also published similar content, "cross-industry collaborating" with Xiaomi. 此外，天猫、京东、元气森林、三只松鼠、顺丰同城、时尚芭莎等品牌也纷纷发表类似内容，与小米「跨界联动」。

item.title: 罗永浩自述「被动成网红」：偶然走红，却成创业助推器
item.guid: 罗永浩自述「被动成网红」：偶然走红，却成创业助推器
item.description:
Yesterday, Luo Yonghao released a podcast program featuring a conversation with Zhou Hongyi on the video platform "Luo Yonghao's Crossroads". 昨天，罗永浩在视频平台「罗永浩的十字路口」发布对谈周鸿祎的播客节目。

During the program, their nearly four-hour conversation covered various topics such as artificial intelligence, how entrepreneurs shape personal IP, the evolution of short videos and the traffic era, and the development of AI business models, containing a vast amount of information. 节目中，二人近四小时的交流覆盖了人工智能、企业家如何塑造个人 IP、短视频与流量时代的变迁、AI 商业模式演进等多个话题，信息量极大。

In the conversation, Luo Yonghao admitted that his initial fame was not due to active management but rather an accidental event. 在对话中，罗永浩坦言自己最初成名并非主动经营，而是一次偶然事件所致。

When I was teaching at school back then, my class recordings suddenly circulated online, and I was forced to become an internet celebrity.

He emphasized that this was not a conscious act, but "becoming an internet celebrity brought me many benefits." On his subsequent entrepreneurial journey, personal influence became an important driver for businesses to gain attention and resources. 他强调，这并不是有意识的行为，但「成了网红给我带来很多好处」，在之后的创业道路上，个人影响力成为企业获得关注和资源的重要推手。

Zhou Hongyi responded that this kind of "passive popularity" instead demonstrated the importance of personal branding today. "I'm just learning from you, taking you as a role model." 周鸿祎则回应称，这种「被动走红」反而展现了个人品牌在当下的重要性。「我只不过是向你学习，以你为榜样。」

In a broader context, Zhou Hongyi also proposed the "generational evolution of internet celebrity culture": initially individual internet celebrities (1.0), followed by entrepreneur internet celebrities (2.0), and now even cities, tourist attractions, and cultural tourism organizations are joining in (3.0). 在更广的语境中，周鸿祎还提出「网红化的代际演化」：最初是个人网红（1.0），随后出现企业家网红（2.0），再到如今连城市、景点、文旅机构都加入其中（3.0）。

He believes this reflects a comprehensive transformation in social communication methods, and Luo Yonghao's "passive rise to internet celebrity" is actually an early microcosm of a major trend of the era. 他认为这反映了社会传播方式的全面转型，罗永浩「被动成网红」其实是时代大趋势的早期缩影。

item.title: 阿里 CEO：终极目标是超级人工智能
item.guid: 阿里-CEO：终极目标是超级人工智能
item.description:
Yesterday, at the Apsara Conference held in Hangzhou, Alibaba Group CEO and Chairman & CEO of Alibaba Cloud Intelligence Group, Eddie Wu, delivered a keynote speech. 昨天，在杭州召开的云栖大会上，阿里巴巴集团 CEO、阿里云智能集团董事长兼 CEO 吴泳铭发表主旨演讲。

He stated that achieving Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) is a "certainty," but this is merely the starting point; the ultimate goal is to develop Superintelligence (ASI) that can self-iterate and completely surpass humans. 他表示，实现通用人工智能 AGI 已是「确定性事件」，但这只是起点，终极目标是发展出能自我迭代、全面超越人类的超级人工智能 ASI。

The intelligence revolution will far exceed our imagination. Artificial General Intelligence will not only amplify human intellect but also unleash human potential, paving the way for the advent of Superintelligence (ASI).

Eddie Wu for the first time systematically elaborated on the three-stage evolutionary roadmap towards ASI: 吴泳铭首次系统阐述了通往 ASI 的三阶段演进路线：

    Phase 1 "Intelligence Emergence": AI gains generalized intelligence by learning vast amounts of human knowledge;

    Phase 2 "Autonomous Action": AI masters tool use and programming capabilities, entering the "assisting humans" stage;

    Phase 3 "Self-Iteration": AI connects with the physical world and achieves self-learning, ultimately "surpassing humans".

On its strategic path, Alibaba Cloud will adhere to two major directions: 在战略路径上，阿里云将坚持两大方向：

    Tongyi Qianwen will firmly follow the open-source route, aiming to create the "Android of the AI era";

    Building a super AI cloud as the "next-generation computer" to provide intelligent computing power networks globally.

Wu Yongming revealed that Alibaba is advancing a three-year, 380 billion AI infrastructure construction plan, and it is expected that by 2032, the energy consumption scale of Alibaba Cloud's global data centers will increase tenfold compared to 2022, in preparation for the arrival of the ASI era. 吴泳铭透露，阿里巴巴正在推进三年 3800 亿的 AI 基础设施建设计划，并预计到 2032 年，阿里云全球数据中心的能耗规模将较 2022 年提升 10 倍，以迎接 ASI 时代的到来。

It is reported that since its first holding in 2015, the Apsara Conference has gone through a decade, gradually becoming an important benchmark for China's technology industry. 据悉，自 2015 年首次举办以来，云栖大会已走过十年历程，逐渐成为中国科技产业的重要风向标。

item.title: 理想法务部：发布「i6」虚假信息，涉事 MCN 已被处罚
item.guid: 理想法务部：发布「i6」虚假信息，涉事-MCN-已被处罚
item.description:
Li Auto's legal department issued a statement on Weibo yesterday, stating that it recently discovered a certain online account with an IP address in Inner Mongolia publishing false and misleading information about the unreleased new model "Li Auto i6" on the Toutiao platform. 理想汽车法务部昨天在微博发布声明称，近日发现 IP 地址位于内蒙古的某网络账号在今日头条平台发布关于未上市新款车型「理想 i6」的虚假及误导性信息。

According to the description, the relevant posts fabricated content such as after-sales disputes, battery supply, and contract terms, causing a negative impact on the brand. 据描述，相关贴文捏造了售后争议、电池供应及合同条款等内容，对品牌造成不良影响。

Li Auto's legal department emphasized that the company welcomes truthful and objective supervision and evaluation, but will resolutely take legal action against malicious rumors and defamation of its products and brand, showing no tolerance. 理想法务部强调，公司欢迎真实、客观的监督与评价，但对恶意造谣、抹黑产品和品牌的行为将坚决采取法律手段打击，绝不姑息。

It is reported that the Li Auto i6 will be officially released at 15:00 on September 26. 据悉，理想 i6 将于 9 月 26 日 15:00 正式发布。

item.title: 机构称未来全球手机价格将上涨 11%
item.guid: 机构称未来全球手机价格将上涨-11%
item.description:
Market research firm Counterpoint released its latest forecast, stating that the global average selling price (ASP) of smartphones will steadily rise from $370 (approximately RMB 2,700) in 2025 to $412 (approximately RMB 3,000) in 2029, with a compound annual growth rate of 3%. 市场研究机构 Counterpoint 发布最新预测称，全球智能手机平均售价（ASP）将从 2025 年的 370 美元（约合人民币 2,700 元）稳步升至 2029 年的 412 美元（约合人民币 3,000 元），年均复合增长率为 3%。

The report points out that global smartphone annual revenue is expected to reach $564 billion (approximately RMB 4 trillion) in 2029, with a compound annual growth rate of 5% from 2025 to 2029. 报告指出，全球智能手机年收入预计将在 2029 年达到 5,640 亿美元（约合人民币 4 万亿元），2025 至 2029 年的年均复合增长率为 5%。

Driving factors include the accelerated implementation of Generative AI (GenAI), the easing of tariff fluctuations, and the evolution of market structures in various regions. 推动因素包括生成式 AI（GenAI）的加速落地、关税波动的缓和以及各区域市场结构的演变。

Among them, the North American market's ASP is expected to grow by 7% year-on-year in 2025, while the Chinese market is expected to grow by 3.6% year-on-year, mainly driven by high-end models. 其中，北美市场 ASP 预计在 2025 年同比增长 7%，中国市场则预计同比增长 3.6%，主要由高端机型推动。

Apple remains a core pillar of the high-end market, with its average selling price expected to rise from $919 in 2025 to nearly $1,000 in 2029, an increase of approximately 8.8%. 苹果依旧是高端市场的核心支柱，其平均售价预计将从 2025 年的 919 美元升至 2029 年的近 1,000 美元，增幅约 8.8%。

Counterpoint stated that with the trend towards premiumization, 5G adoption, and increased consumer preference for advanced features, smartphone ASP will maintain a moderate upward trend. Counterpoint 表示，随着高端化趋势、5G 普及以及消费者对高级功能的偏好增强，智能手机 ASP 将保持温和上行。

Furthermore, the popularization of foldable screens and AI phones will further push up overall price levels. 此外，折叠屏与 AI 手机的普及也将进一步抬升整体价格水平。

item.title: 平台回应「李浩同学选班长」投票事件：未发现异常
item.guid: 平台回应「李浩同学选班长」投票事件：未发现异常
item.description:
According to Shangguan News, on September 23, a WeChat mini-program poll about a school's "Class 3 Monitor" went viral on social media platforms after its link was accidentally leaked, ultimately attracting over 1.32 million participants. 上观新闻报道，9 月 23 日，一则关于某学校「三班班长」的微信小程序投票因链接意外流出，引发社交平台广泛传播，最终吸引超 132 万人参与。

Voting results showed that as of 19:16 on September 23, student Li Hao was far ahead with 1,294,746 votes (97.6% share), far surpassing the other two candidates, and the incident sparked heated discussion among netizens. 投票结果显示，截至 9 月 23 日 19:16，李浩同学以 1,294,746 票（占比 97.6%）遥遥领先，远超其他两名候选人，事件引发网友热议。

That evening, Beijing Kuaiyuntonghe Technology Co., Ltd., the developer of the WeChat mini-program "Group Voting," responded that the initiator had set it as a public vote, supporting sharing to Moments or WeChat groups. 当晚，微信小程序「群投票」开发方北京快云通合科技有限公司回应称，发起人设置为公开投票，支持分享至朋友圈或微信群。

Regarding whether there was vote-rigging, the staff stated, "No abnormalities have been found so far." 针对是否存在刷票行为，工作人员则表示「目前未发现异常」。

item.title: 💡 Sam Altman：获取 AI 将被视为一项基本人权
item.guid: 💡-Sam-Altman：获取-AI-将被视为一项基本人权
item.description:
Recently, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman published a long article titled "Abundant Intelligence" on his personal blog, outlining his vision for future AI infrastructure development. 日前，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 在个人博客发表题为《丰富的智能（Abundant Intelligence）》的长文，提出了未来 AI 基础设施建设的愿景。

Altman stated that with the rapid development of AI services, access to AI will become a core driver of economic development, and may even be considered "a basic human right." Altman 表示，随着 AI 服务的快速发展，获取 AI 将成为经济发展的核心驱动力，甚至可能被视为「一项基本人权」。

He emphasized that in the future, almost everyone will want more AI to work for them. 他强调，未来几乎所有人都希望有更多 AI 为自己工作。

In the article, Altman put forward an ambitious goal — to build a "factory capable of producing 1 gigawatt of new AI infrastructure per week." 在文章中，Altman 提出了一个雄心勃勃的目标 —— 打造一座「每周能生产 1 吉瓦新 AI 基础设施的工厂」。

He pointed out that the execution of this plan will be extremely difficult, requiring innovation at multiple levels including chips, power, construction, and robotics, but he believes it is achievable. 他指出，这一计划的执行将极其困难，需要在芯片、电力、建筑和机器人等多个层面进行创新，但他相信这是可能实现的。

Altman also gave an example, stating that with 10 gigawatts of computing power, AI might be able to find a cure for cancer or provide personalized tutoring for every student globally. Altman 还举例称，如果拥有 10 吉瓦计算力，AI 或许能够找到治愈癌症的方法、或为全球每一名学生提供个性化辅导。

He emphasized that the expansion of computing power will directly determine AI's potential and scope of application. 他强调，计算力的扩展将直接决定 AI 的潜力与应用范围。

Additionally, Altman revealed that more partners and plan details will be announced in the coming months, and financing options will be introduced later this year. 此外，Altman 透露，未来几个月将公布更多合作伙伴与计划细节，并在今年晚些时候介绍融资方案。

He believes this will be "the coolest and most important infrastructure project ever" and hopes to build more capacity in the United States to cope with global competition. 他认为，这将是「有史以来最酷、最重要的基础设施项目」，并希望在美国本土建设更多产能，以应对全球竞争。

item.title: 第五代骁龙 8 至尊版正式发布
item.guid: 第五代骁龙-8-至尊版正式发布
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Qualcomm officially released its new generation flagship mobile platform, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, today. 据 Android Authority 报道，高通于今日正式发布了新一代旗舰移动平台骁龙 8 Elite Gen 5。

According to the official introduction, the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 is manufactured using TSMC's N3P 3nm process, maintaining a 2+6 core architecture, with a maximum clock speed of 4.6GHz, and even up to 4.74GHz for some models. 根据官方介绍，骁龙 8 Elite Gen 5 采用台积电 N3P 3nm 工艺制造，继续维持 2+6 核心架构，主频最高可达 4.6GHz，部分机型甚至可达 4.74GHz。

Qualcomm states that its overall performance has increased by approximately 20%, energy efficiency by 35%, and the entire platform's power consumption has decreased by 16%. 高通称其整体性能提升约 20%，能效提升 35%，整个平台功耗降低 16%。

In terms of graphics performance, the new platform continues the "tiled" architecture and introduces Adreno High Performance Memory (18MB dedicated cache). The official statement indicates it can bring up to 23% performance improvement and 20% power consumption reduction, while also supporting full Unreal Engine 5 features. 在图形性能方面，新平台延续了「切片式」架构，并引入 Adreno High Performance Memory（18MB 专用缓存），官方表示可带来最高 23% 的性能提升和 20% 的功耗下降，同时支持完整的虚幻 5 特性。

Regarding AI capabilities, the upgraded Hexagon NPU shows a 37% performance increase and for the first time supports INT2 precision, enabling it to run larger AI models locally. AI 能力方面，升级后的 Hexagon NPU 性能提升 37%，并首次支持 INT2 精度，能够在本地运行更大规模的 AI 模型。

Imaging features are a key focus of this update. 影像功能是此次更新的重点。

The Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 is the first mobile platform to support APV (Advanced Professional Video) codec. This technology, led by Samsung, claims to achieve "nearly lossless" video quality and supports post-production color and lighting adjustments. Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 成为首款支持 APV（Advanced Professional Video）编解码的移动平台，该技术由三星主导，号称可实现「近乎无损」的视频质量，并支持后期色彩和光影调整。

Additionally, the platform introduces Dragon Fusion technology, which claims to fully computationalize video processing, optimizing every frame to photo-grade standards. 此外，平台还引入 Dragon Fusion 技术，号称可将视频处理完全计算化，每一帧画面都按照片级标准进行优化。

In terms of audio, the new platform supports Snapdragon Audio Sense, featuring functions such as wind noise cancellation, audio zoom, and HDR audio recording. The official statement even claims it can replace additional microphone equipment. 音频方面，新平台支持 Snapdragon Audio Sense，具备风噪消除、音频变焦和 HDR 音频录制等功能，官方甚至宣称可替代额外的麦克风设备。

In terms of connectivity, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 integrates the X85 modem , supporting a maximum downlink rate of 12.5Gbps and an uplink rate of 3.7Gbps, and continues to integrate Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, and UWB functions. 连接性方面，Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 集成 X85 基带 ，支持最高 12.5Gbps 下行速率和 3.7Gbps 上行速率，并继续整合 Wi-Fi 7、蓝牙 6.0 及 UWB 功能。

The first batch of models equipped with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 will include: 首批搭载 Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 的机型将包括：

    Xiaomi 17 series (first launch)

    Samsung Galaxy S26 series (some models)

    OnePlus 13

    Flagship models from brands such as Honor, OPPO, vivo, Realme, and Redmi

Qualcomm stated that related new phones will be released successively in the coming weeks, with the Xiaomi 17 series making its debut tonight at Lei Jun's annual speech. 高通表示，相关新机将在未来数周内陆续发布，其中小米 17 系列将于今晚在雷军年度演讲上率先亮相。

In addition, Qualcomm also released two PC chips, X2 Elite / Elite Extreme, at this launch event, claiming them to be the 'most powerful and energy-efficient Windows PC processors'. 此外，高通还在本次发布会上发布了 X2 Elite / Elite Extreme 两款 PC 芯片，号称「性能最强、能效最高 Windows PC 处理器」。

item.title: 打造个性化「安卓人」，Google 推出 Androidify 应用
item.guid: 打造个性化「安卓人」，Google-推出-Androidify-应用
item.description:
Google recently officially launched a new application, Androidify, allowing users to generate their exclusive Android robot image by uploading selfies or entering prompts, with the help of AI technology. Google 于日前正式上线全新应用 Androidify，用户可通过上传自拍或输入提示词，借助 AI 技术生成专属的 Android 机器人形象。

The application is now available for download simultaneously on the web and in the Google Play Store. 该应用现已在网页端及 Google Play 商店同步开放下载。

According to the introduction, Androidify integrates Gemini and Firebase AI Logic SDK, supporting functions such as image verification, automatic description generation, and personalized robot generation. 据介绍，Androidify 集成了 Gemini 与 Firebase AI Logic SDK，支持图像验证、自动生成描述以及个性化机器人生成等功能。

The application first uses Gemini 2.5 Flash to detect user-uploaded photos, ensuring the image is clear and meets safety standards, then generates a detailed description, and finally calls the Imagen 3 model to generate the ultimate robot image. 应用会先利用 Gemini 2.5 Flash 对用户上传的照片进行检测，确保画面清晰且符合安全标准，随后生成详细描述，并调用 Imagen 3 模型生成最终的机器人形象。

It's worth mentioning that the latest version also adds 'background atmosphere generation' and 'sticker mode'. 值得一提的是，最新版本还新增了「背景氛围生成」与「贴纸模式」。

The former can add scene backgrounds to robots via the Gemini model, while the latter uses ML Kit segmentation technology to remove backgrounds, generating PNG stickers that can be used in chat applications. 前者可通过 Gemini 模型为机器人添加场景背景，后者则利用 ML Kit 分割技术去除背景，生成可在聊天应用中使用的 PNG 贴纸。

Google states that Androidify's goal is to allow users to experience the creativity and personalization brought by the combination of AI and Android technology while enjoying easy entertainment. Google 表示，Androidify 的目标是让用户在轻松娱乐的同时，体验到 AI 与 Android 技术结合所带来的创造力与个性化。

item.title: 通义千问迄今规模最大的模型亮相
item.guid: 通义千问迄今规模最大的模型亮相
item.description:
At the 2025 Apsara Conference held yesterday, Alibaba released several new products, covering multiple models. 在昨天举办的 2025 云栖大会上，阿里巴巴发布了多款全新产品，涵盖多款模型。

    Qwen3-Max, Tongyi Qianwen's largest model to date

According to the official introduction, the Qwen3-Max series has reached industry-leading levels in areas such as inference, programming, agent tasks, and multilingual understanding. 官方介绍称，Qwen3-Max 系列在推理、编程、智能体任务和多语言理解等方面均达到业界领先水平。

According to public information, the Qwen3-Max series includes multiple versions, among which Qwen3-Max-Instruct has ranked among the top three globally on the LMArena text leaderboard, surpassing GPT-5-Chat. 据公开信息，Qwen3-Max 系列包含多个版本，其中 Qwen3-Max-Instruct 已在 LMArena 文本排行榜上位列全球前三，超越了 GPT-5-Chat。

The official version further enhances code generation and agent capabilities, achieving 69.6 points in the SWE-Bench Verified benchmark and surpassing Claude Opus 4 and DeepSeek-V3.1 with a score of 74.8 points on Tau2-Bench. 正式版本在代码生成与智能体能力方面进一步提升，在 SWE-Bench Verified 基准测试中取得 69.6 分，在 Tau2-Bench 上则以 74.8 分的成绩超越 Claude Opus 4 与 DeepSeek-V3.1。

Additionally, the Qwen3-Max-Thinking version, currently in training, achieved perfect scores in the high-difficulty math reasoning tests AIME 25 and HMMT, demonstrating strong potential. 此外，正在训练中的 Qwen3-Max-Thinking 版本在高难度数学推理测试 AIME 25 与 HMMT 中均取得满分，显示出较强的潜力。

Qwen3-Max has a total parameter scale exceeding 1T , with pre-training data reaching 36T tokens; it adopts an MoE model structure; under PAI-FlashMoE optimization, training efficiency is increased by approximately 30% compared to its predecessor; it supports a maximum context training of 1M. Qwen3-Max 总参数规模超过 1T ，预训练数据量达 36T tokens；采用 MoE 模型结构；在 PAI-FlashMoE 优化下，训练效率较前代提升约 30%；拥有最长 1M 上下文训练。

Currently, users can directly experience Qwen3-Max-Instruct via the Qwen Chat platform (direct experience link: https://chat.qwen.ai/)direct experience ), or access it through the Alibaba Cloud API . 目前，用户可通过 Qwen Chat 平台 直接体验]( https://chat.qwen.ai/)直接体验 ) Qwen3-Max-Instruct，或通过 阿里云 API 接入使用。

  • Tongyi Wanxiang 2.5 Series Models Released, Quark Launches New Creation Platform "Zaodian" 通义万相 2.5 系列模型发布，夸克上线全新创作平台「造点」

It is reported that the Tongyi Wanxiang 2.5 series models cover capabilities such as text-to-video, image-to-video, text-to-image, and image editing. They are the first to achieve audio-visual synchronized video generation, capable of matching human voices, sound effects, and background music while generating visuals. 据悉，通义万相 2.5 系列模型覆盖文生视频、图生视频、文生图和图像编辑等能力，首次实现音画同步的视频生成，能够在生成画面的同时匹配人声、音效和背景音乐。

Compared to previous versions, the new model shows improvements in generation duration, image quality, and instruction understanding. The model also possesses strong instruction-following capabilities, enabling complex continuous changes such as camera movements. 相比前代版本，新模型在生成时长、画质和指令理解方面均有提升。模型还具备较强的指令遵循能力，可实现运镜等复杂连续变化。

Quark's newly launched "Zaodian" platform has taken the lead in integrating Tongyi Wanxiang 2.5 and introducing Midjourney V7, offering users an integrated image and video creation experience. 而夸克全新推出的「造点」平台率先接入通义万相 2.5，并引入 Midjourney V7，为用户提供图像与视频一体化的创作体验。

Regarding video generation, "Zaodian" can output content up to 10 seconds in length, supports 1080P HD quality at 24 frames/second, and can simultaneously incorporate human voices, sound effects, and background music in a single generation. 视频生成方面，「造点」可输出 10 秒时长的内容，支持 24 帧/秒的 1080P 高清画质，并能在单次生成中同步配合人声、音效与背景音乐。

Combined with Quark's self-developed technology, the platform also features targeted optimizations in Asian portrait generation, Chinese text generation, and the expression of traditional Chinese elements. 结合夸克自研技术，平台还在亚洲人像生成、中文文字生成及国风元素表现上有针对性优化。

Currently, users can experience the platform via zaodian.quark.cn or the "AI Image Generation" entry on Quark's PC client; on mobile, the Quark APP offers a lightweight version, supporting features like "One-sentence Image Editing" and "AI Creative Video". 目前用户可通过 zaodian.quark.cn 或夸克 PC 端「AI 生图」入口体验该平台；在移动端，夸克 APP 提供轻量化版本，支持「一句话 P 图」「AI 创意视频」等功能。

The official announcement states that from now until September 30th, all users can experience Tongyi Wanxiang Wan2.5's video generation capabilities for free for a limited period of 7 days. 官方宣布，即日起至 9 月 30 日，所有用户可限时 7 天免费体验通义万相 Wan2.5 的视频生成能力。

item.title: 最长续航 21 天，华为 WATCH GT 6 系列亮相，FreeClip 2 耳机同台登场
item.guid: 最长续航-21-天，华为-WATCH-GT-6-系列亮相，FreeClip-2-耳机同台登场
item.description:
On September 24th, Huawei held an online launch event for new wearable audio products, introducing several new items including the HUAWEI WATCH GT 6 series, HUAWEI FreeClip 2 ear-clip headphones, and Huawei Vision Smart Screen 5 Pro. 华为于 9 月 24 日召开了穿戴音频新品线上发布会，带来了 HUAWEI WATCH GT 6 系列、HUAWEI FreeClip 2 耳夹耳机以及华为 Vision 智慧屏 5 Pro 等多款新品。

According to reports, the WATCH GT 6 series continues the GT series' high-end design philosophy, offering multiple options including a Pro version, a large 46 mm dial, and a small 41 mm dial, catering to diverse user needs. Key selling points include: 据介绍，WATCH GT 6 系列延续了 GT 系列的高端设计路线，提供 Pro 版本、大表盘 46 mm 以及小表盘 41 mm 多种选择，覆盖不同用户需求，主要卖点包括：

  • WATCH GT 6 Pro: Features a sapphire glass mirror, aerospace-grade titanium alloy body, and microcrystalline nanocrystalline ceramic back cover WATCH GT 6 Pro：采用蓝宝石玻璃镜面、航天级钛合金机身与微晶纳米陶瓷后壳
  • 46 mm Version: Up to 21 days of battery life, supports 40 hours of outdoor sports tracking 46 mm 版本：最长续航可达 21 天，支持户外运动 40 小时续航
  • 41 mm Version: Up to 14 days of battery life, supports 25 hours of outdoor sports tracking 41 mm 版本：最长续航可达 14 天，支持户外运动 25 小时续航
  • Upgraded Sunflower Positioning System, with approximately 20% improved positioning accuracy 升级版向日葵定位系统，定位精度提升约 20%
  • Supports professional sports modes such as cycling simulated power, trail running, skiing, and golf 支持骑行模拟功率、越野跑、滑雪和高尔夫等专业运动模式

    • Adds an emotional health assistant that can identify 12 emotional states and provide scenario-based health summaries.

Regarding pricing, the HUAWEI WATCH GT 6 46 mm starts at 1588 yuan, the 41 mm starts at 1488 yuan, and sales begin on September 29th; the Pro version starts at 2488 yuan and will be officially launched on October 20th. 价格方面，HUAWEI WATCH GT 6 46 mm 起售价 1588 元，41 mm 起售价 1488 元，9 月 29 日开售；Pro 版起售价 2488 元，将于 10 月 20 日正式上市。

Another new product, the HUAWEI FreeClip 2 ear-clip headphones, also debuted at the press conference, focusing on open-ear wearing and smart interaction. Key selling points include: 另一款新品 HUAWEI FreeClip 2 耳夹耳机也在发布会上亮相，主打开放式佩戴与智能交互，主要卖点包括：

    Features a cloud-feel C-bridge design for light and secure wear.

    Equipped with a third-generation audio chip and NPU AI processor, with 10 times the computing power of the previous generation.

    Features dual-engine units, delivering clear treble and powerful bass.

    Supports features such as Xiaoyi wake-up, smart broadcast, Xiaoyi translation, and head-movement broadcast.

    Available in three colors: Denim Blue, Feather Sand White, and Modern Black.

The HUAWEI FreeClip 2 ear-clip headphones are priced at 1299 yuan and will go on sale on October 20th. HUAWEI FreeClip 2 耳夹耳机定价 1299 元，将于 10 月 20 日开售。

item.title: 「薄到飞起」，OPPO Watch S 定档 10 月 16 日
item.guid: 「薄到飞起」，OPPO-Watch-S-定档-10-月-16-日
item.description:
OPPO announced today that the OPPO Watch S smartwatch will make its global debut on October 16th, with the new product positioned as the "King of Thin and Light Watches." OPPO 今日宣布，OPPO Watch S 智能手表将于 10 月 16 日全球首发，新品定位为「轻薄表皇」。

Judging from the official warm-up videos and posters, the OPPO Watch S adopts a family-style design language, featuring a round dial and a rotating crown. 从官方预热视频和海报来看，OPPO Watch S 采用家族式设计语言，配备圆形表盘与旋钮表冠。

According to reports, the "S" in the model name stands for "Slim," emphasizing its thin and light attributes. The official slogan is "So light you don't feel it, so thin it flies," but the specific thickness and weight have not yet been announced. 据介绍，型号中的「S」代表「Slim」，突出轻薄属性。官方打出「轻到无感，薄到飞起」的 slogan，但具体厚度与重量尚未公布。

According to leaks, the product's thickness will be less than 9mm, potentially making it the thinnest round smartwatch currently on the market. 有爆料称，该产品厚度将小于 9mm，有望成为目前市面上最薄的圆形智能手表。

In terms of configuration, according to previous leaks from blogger "Digital Chat Station," the new product features a Snapdragon W5 + BES2800 MCU dual-chip architecture, supports all-day health monitoring, and offers a system fluidity close to that of a mobile phone. 配置方面，据此前博主「数码闲聊站」爆料，新品搭载骁龙 W5 + BES2800 MCU 双芯架构，支持全天候健康监测，系统流畅度接近手机操作体验。

For reference, OPPO launched the Watch X2 series earlier this year, including standard and Mini versions, focusing respectively on high-end health features and thin and portable design. 作为参考，OPPO 今年早些时候已推出 Watch X2 系列，包括标准版与 Mini 版，分别主打高端健康功能与轻薄便携设计。

item.title: 支持自然语言生成情绪板，Google 推出 AI 工具 Mixboard
item.guid: 支持自然语言生成情绪板，Google-推出-AI-工具-Mixboard
item.description:
According to Neowin, Google announced the launch of Mixboard, a new experimental AI tool, featuring an "open canvas" and generative AI capabilities, aimed at helping users quickly visualize ideas. 据 Neowin 报道，Google 宣布推出全新实验性 AI 工具 Mixboard，主打「开放画布」与生成式 AI 能力，旨在帮助用户快速可视化创意。

According to reports, Mixboard allows users to start projects with text prompts or preset templates. Users can upload their own images or enter descriptions to generate visual elements, such as "show Memphis-style cups, bowls, and plates" or "show a bird with funny eyes." 据介绍，Mixboard 可通过文本提示或预设模板开启项目，用户既能上传自有图片，也能输入描述生成视觉元素，例如「展示 Memphis 风格的杯子、碗和盘子」或「展示长着滑稽眼睛的小鸟」。

The tool also supports natural language editing, allowing users to directly input commands to modify the canvas or synthesize images. 该工具还支持自然语言编辑，用户可直接输入指令对画板进行修改或合成图像。

Google stated that this feature is powered by the new image editing model "Nano Banana" and provides a one-click "regenerate" option for quick iteration of ideas. Google 表示，这一功能由新图像编辑模型「Nano Banana」驱动，并提供一键「再生成」选项，便于快速迭代创意。

Currently, Mixboard has launched public testing in the United States, and users can experience it via labs.google/mixboard. 目前，Mixboard 已在美国开启公开测试，用户可通过 labs.google/mixboard 体验。

Additionally, Google recently extended the "Conversational Editing" feature, previously exclusive to Pixel 10, to more Android users and added Spanish language support for AI mode in Search globally. 此外，Google 近期还将此前仅限 Pixel 10 的「对话式编辑」功能扩展至更多 Android 用户，并在全球范围内为搜索中的 AI 模式新增西班牙语支持。

item.title: 1688 发布跨境电商智能体「遨虾」
item.guid: 1688-发布跨境电商智能体「遨虾」
item.description:
Alibaba's direct-from-factory platform 1688 showcased its latest AI capability matrix at the Apsara Conference and unveiled its cross-border e-commerce intelligent agent "Ao Xia" for the first time. 阿里巴巴旗下源头厂货平台 1688 在云栖大会上展示了其最新的 AI 能力矩阵，并首次公开跨境电商智能体「遨虾」。

The product is currently in internal testing and is expected to launch in November, primarily targeting overseas small and medium-sized buyers, aiming to lower the barrier to cross-border procurement. 该产品目前处于内测阶段，预计将于 11 月上线，主要面向海外中小买家，旨在降低跨境采购的门槛。

According to the introduction, "Ao Xia" can extract key features using visual recognition and semantic analysis by inputting links to popular overseas products, then match them with domestic factories capable of production on the platform, shortening the original multi-day product selection cycle to just minutes. 据介绍，「遨虾」能够通过输入海外热销商品链接，利用视觉识别与语义分析提取关键特征，并在平台上匹配具备生产能力的国内工厂，将原本需要数天的选品周期缩短至数分钟。

In terms of compliance, the system can prompt certification requirements and environmental standards for target markets during the initial product selection phase, reducing potential risks. 在合规方面，系统可在选品初期提示目标市场的认证要求与环保标准，降低潜在风险。

In addition to "Ao Xia," 1688 has also iterated the features of its AI version App. Building upon existing functions like AI search, AI product selection, AI design creation, AI image search, and AI enterprise lookup, it has added "AI Factory Finder" and "AI Consultant." 除了「遨虾」，1688 还对 AI 版 App 进行了功能迭代。在原有 AI 搜索、AI 选品、AI 创款、AI 图搜、AI 查企等功能基础上，新增了「AI 找厂」与「AI 参谋」。

item.title: 阶跃星辰推出电脑端 Agent
item.guid: 阶跃星辰推出电脑端-Agent
item.description:
Jieyue Xingchen announced the start of internal testing for "Jieyue AI Desktop Partner." 阶跃星辰宣布开启「阶跃 AI 桌面伙伴」内测。

This product is positioned as a desktop Agent, capable of executing complex tasks in a local environment and deeply integrated with the operating system. 这款产品定位为电脑端 Agent，能够在本地环境中执行复杂任务，并与操作系统深度连接。

Unlike most Agents on the market that only rely on a browser environment, "Jieyue AI Desktop Partner" can run simultaneously in local, browser, and terminal environments, supporting operations such as retrieving and processing files, calling system calendars and memos, and executing scheduled tasks. 与市面上多数仅依赖浏览器环境的 Agent 不同，「阶跃 AI 桌面伙伴」可在本地、浏览器和终端环境中同时运行，支持检索和处理文件、调用系统日历与备忘录、执行定时任务等操作。

The official statement indicates that its goal is to help users reduce repetitive tasks and focus their energy on higher-value work segments. 官方表示，其目标是帮助用户减少重复性事务，将精力集中在更高价值的工作环节。

The product also provides a floating window entry, making it convenient to quickly summon the Agent, view task planning and progress, or directly open files and web pages. 产品还提供了悬浮窗入口，便于快速唤起 Agent，查看任务规划与进度，或直接打开文件与网页。

The floating window also includes features such as sedentary reminders and water intake reminders, emphasizing a user-caring experience. 悬浮窗同时具备久坐提醒、喝水提醒等功能，强调用户关怀体验。

Furthermore, "Jieyue AI Desktop Partner" introduces the "Brilliant Idea" feature, allowing users to share and reuse professional Prompts. For instance, ordinary users can directly invoke industry analyst instruction templates to quickly generate research reports with greater reference value. 此外，「阶跃 AI 桌面伙伴」引入了「妙计」功能，允许用户分享和复用专业 Prompt。例如，普通用户可以直接调用行业分析师的指令模板，快速生成更具参考价值的研究报告。

Currently, the Mac version of Jieyue AI Desktop Partner is available for download, with the Windows version expected to be released later. 目前，阶跃 AI 桌面伙伴 Mac 版已开放下载，Windows 版预计将在后续推出。

item.title: 15.98 万起，全新领克 08 EM-P 上市
item.guid: 15.98-万起，全新领克-08-EM-P-上市
item.description:
Yesterday, the all-new Lynk & Co 08 EM-P was officially released, with a limited-time promotional price range of 159,800 to 212,800 yuan. 昨天，全新领克 08 EM-P 正式发布，新车限时权益价区间为 15.98 万元至 21.28 万元。

Compared to the old model, the new car offers higher specifications while lowering its price. 相比老款车型，新车在价格下探的同时，带来了更高规格的配置。

  • Laser radar is standard across all models 全系标配激光雷达
  • Equipped with Qualcomm Snapdragon 8295 chip (cockpit) 搭载高通骁龙 8295 芯片（座舱）

The front features a through-type grille, with new body colors such as "Gleaming Gold" and "Sky Blue," while the interior offers new schemes like "Dawn Orange" and "Sunlight Beige." The rear seats support electric stepless adjustment. 车头采用贯穿式前格栅，新增「鎏光金」「晴空蓝」等车身配色，内饰则提供「曙光橙」「日光米」等新方案，后排座椅支持电动无级调节。

item.title: 新款奇瑞瑞虎 9 将于 27 日上市，配备高阶辅助驾驶
item.guid: 新款奇瑞瑞虎-9-将于-27-日上市，配备高阶辅助驾驶
item.description:
Recently, a set of road test spy photos of the new Chery Tiggo 9 were exposed on social media. 日前，社交媒体上曝光了一组新款奇瑞瑞虎 9 的路测谍照。

The new car has undergone adjustments in its exterior design, still retaining a large intake grille, with wide air ducts reserved on both sides. The front headlights are sharper, and the overall front fascia appears more dominant. 新车在外观设计上有所调整，依旧保留大尺寸进气格栅，两侧预留了宽大的导流槽，前大灯造型更为犀利，整体前脸视觉效果更显霸气。

The side of the car features the text "I am a gasoline car, I am in intelligent assisted driving," indicating that its biggest highlight is the inclusion of advanced assisted driving functions despite being a fuel vehicle. 车身侧面出现了「我是油车，我在智能辅助驾驶」的字样，显示其最大亮点是作为燃油车却搭载高阶辅助驾驶功能。

It is worth noting that no lidar protrusion was found in the spy photos, and it is expected that the new car will adopt the Falcon 700 vision solution. 值得注意的是，谍照中并未发现激光雷达的凸起，预计新车将采用猎鹰 700 视觉方案。

This solution features an end-to-end large model and a WM world model, capable of achieving functions such as urban navigation assistance, valet parking, and intelligent summoning. 该方案具备端到端大模型与 WM 世界模型，能够实现城市领航辅助、代客泊车以及智能召唤等功能。

Regarding the rear, the new Tiggo 9 adopts a brand-new through-type taillight design, with the English emblem moved downwards, and features a dual-sided exhaust layout. 尾部方面，新款瑞虎 9 采用全新贯穿式尾灯设计，英文标识下移，并配备双边排气布局。

The official previously confirmed that the new car will be officially launched on September 27. For reference, the current Tiggo 9 is priced between 152,900 yuan and 209,900 yuan. 官方此前已确认，新车将于 9 月 27 日正式上市。作为参考，现款瑞虎 9 售价区间为 15.29 万元至 20.99 万元。

item.title: 499 英镑起，微软 Xbox Ally 掌机价格曝光
item.guid: 499-英镑起，微软-Xbox-Ally-掌机价格曝光
item.description:
According to NoteBookCheck's report yesterday, promotional materials from British retailer Argos prematurely leaked pricing information for Microsoft's Xbox Ally handheld console. 据 NoteBookCheck 昨日报道，英国零售商 Argos 的宣传物料提前泄露了微软 Xbox Ally 掌机的售价信息。

According to the leaked content, the standard version is priced at £499.99 (approximately 4,800 RMB), slightly lower than previous rumors. 根据曝光内容，标准版定价为 499.99 英镑（约 4800 元人民币），较此前传闻略低。

Sources revealed that this model might begin pre-sales soon, but the promotional leaflet did not feature the more powerful Xbox Ally X version. It is rumored that the latter's price could reach £799. 消息人士透露，该机型或将于近期开启预售，但宣传单中并未出现性能更强的 Xbox Ally X 版本。有爆料称，后者售价可能达到 799 英镑。

Previously, Spanish channels showed the Xbox Ally standard version priced at €599 and the Ally X at €899; while materials from US retailer Best Buy indicated prices of $549.99 for the standard version and $899.99 for the high-end version, respectively. 此前，西班牙渠道曾显示，Xbox Ally 标准版售价为 599 欧元，Ally X 为 899 欧元；而美国零售商 Best Buy 的物料则显示，标准版与高配版价格分别为 549.99 美元和 899.99 美元。

It is worth noting that European prices usually include VAT, while US prices require additional sales tax, thus there are some differences in price comparisons across different markets. 值得注意的是，欧洲售价通常已包含增值税，而美国售价则需额外加收销售税，因此不同市场的价格对比存在一定差异。

It is reported that the Xbox Ally series will be officially released on October 16, and Microsoft is expected to announce the final pricing and more details at the Tokyo Game Show event on September 25. 据悉，Xbox Ally 系列将于 10 月 16 日正式发售，微软有望在 9 月 25 日的东京电玩展活动上公布最终定价与更多细节。

item.title: 9 月游戏版号下发：《双影奇境》《归环》《潜水员戴夫》等过审
item.guid: 9-月游戏版号下发：《双影奇境》《归环》《潜水员戴夫》等过审
item.description:
Yesterday evening, the National Press and Publication Administration announced the approval results for domestic and imported online games for September 2025. A total of 156 products were approved, including 145 domestic online games and 11 imported online games. 昨天晚间，国家新闻出版署公布了 2025 年 9 月国产及进口网络游戏审批结果，共有 156 款产品获批，其中国产网络游戏 145 款，进口网络游戏 11 款。

The domestic games approved this time include: miHoYo's "Honkai: Fateful Sprite", NetEase's "Starry Friends Sunny Day", Saros's "Return Ring", Kingnet Network's "Black Cat Detective: Guardian", Lingxi's "Basketball Girl: Soaring Peak", 37 Interactive Entertainment's "Endless Night", and others. 本次过审的国产游戏包括：米哈游《崩坏：因缘精灵》、网易《星绘友晴天》、萨罗斯《归环》、恺英网络《黑猫警长：守护》、灵犀《篮球少女：飞跃巅峰》、三七互娱《无尽黑夜》等。

Regarding imported games, popular titles such as "Dave the Diver", "Dual Shadow Wonderland", "Astro Bot", and the domestic Steam bestseller "Backpack Battles" are also on the list. 进口游戏方面，热门作品《潜水员戴夫》《双影奇境》《宇宙机器人》以及国产 Steam 热销作品《背包乱斗》等也在名单之列。

The number of licenses issued this time continues the stable trend of recent months, covering various genres such as RPG, action, simulation, and competitive games, further enriching market supply. 本次版号下发数量延续了近月的稳定趋势，涵盖 RPG、动作、模拟、竞技等多种类型，进一步丰富了市场供给。

item.title: 外卖平台服务新规征求意见：收费、促销、入驻全面规范
item.guid: 外卖平台服务新规征求意见：收费、促销、入驻全面规范
item.description:
According to CCTV News, the "Basic Requirements for Food Delivery Platform Service Management (Draft for Comment)", drafted by the State Administration for Market Regulation, was officially released yesterday to solicit public opinions. 据央视新闻报道，市场监管总局组织起草的《外卖平台服务管理基本要求（征求意见稿）》于昨日正式面向社会公开征求意见。

The draft for comment focuses on key issues such as platform fees, promotional activities, merchant onboarding, and delivery personnel rights, aiming to regulate food delivery platform service management, reduce the burden on merchants, and improve overall service quality. 征求意见稿聚焦平台收费、促销行为、商户入驻及配送员权益等重点问题，旨在规范外卖平台服务管理，减轻商户负担，提升整体服务质量。

The document clarifies that food delivery platforms shall not arbitrarily introduce new charging items and must make detailed provisions regarding disclosure methods, settlement details, and promotion effects to prevent opaque charges. 文件明确，外卖平台不得随意新设收费项目，并需在公示方式、结算明细、推广效果等方面作出细化规定，防止不透明收费。

Experts point out that in the future, platforms need to establish a mechanism for reducing technical service fees and provide fee reduction support for small, medium, and micro merchants. 专家指出，未来平台需建立技术服务费下调机制，并对中小微商户提供费用减免扶持。

Regarding price promotions, the draft for comment requires platforms not to force or implicitly force merchants to participate in promotions, nor to pass on promotional costs to merchants, in order to curb "coercive" competition and excessive "price wars". 在价格促销方面，征求意见稿要求平台不得强制或变相强制商户参与促销，也不得将促销成本转嫁给商户，以遏制「裹挟式」竞争和过度「价格战」。

In addition, the document also proposes strengthening merchant qualification review, strictly preventing violations such as "ghost takeaways", and introducing an "order control prompt" mechanism to avoid "order overload" during peak hours affecting consumer experience. 此外，文件还提出加强商户资质审核，严防「幽灵外卖」等违规现象，并引入「接单控制提示」机制，避免高峰期「爆单」影响消费者体验。

Regarding delivery personnel rights, the draft for comment requires platforms to reasonably limit order acceptance duration and daily order volume, and to issue fatigue warnings when continuously accepting orders for more than 4 hours, ensuring delivery personnel's reasonable income and right to rest. 在配送员权益方面，征求意见稿要求平台合理限定接单时长和单日接单量，并在连续接单超过 4 小时时发出疲劳提示，保障配送员合理收入与休息权。

item.title: 大阪世博会官宣联动泡泡玛特推出限定款 LABUBU
item.guid: 大阪世博会官宣联动泡泡玛特推出限定款-LABUBU
item.description:
The official store of Expo 2025 Osaka, Kansai announced yesterday on X that it will release a limited-edition LABUBU x "MYAKU-MYAKU" mascot lanyard doll from October 1st to 11th, priced at 4,400 JPY (approximately 210 CNY). 2025 大阪・关西世博会官方商店昨天在 X 宣布，将于 10 月 1 日至 11 日限时发售 LABUBU 与吉祥物「MYAKU-MYAKU」的联名挂绳人偶，售价为 4,400 日元（约 210 元人民币）。

According to the introduction, this product will be sold via a same-day lottery system using the "LINE App" digital ticket system. Consumers need to scan a QR code on-site to participate in the lottery, with each person limited to one entry per day, and winners can only purchase one item. 据介绍，本次商品采用「LINE 应用」的数字整理券系统进行当日抽选销售。消费者需在现场扫描二维码参与抽签，每人每天限报名一次，中签者仅可购买 1 件商品。

item.title: 零食店「好想来」母公司递交港交所上市申请
item.guid: 零食店「好想来」母公司递交港交所上市申请
item.description:
According to FoodBev Daily, Fujian Wanchen Biotechnology Group Co., Ltd. (Wanchen Group) has officially submitted its listing application to the Hong Kong Stock Exchange recently. 据小食代报道，日前，福建万辰生物科技集团股份有限公司（万辰集团）已正式向港交所递交上市申请。

According to the introduction, as of June 30, 2025, the company's store network has exceeded 15,000 stores, covering 29 provinces nationwide. 据介绍，截至 2025 年 6 月 30 日，该公司门店网络已突破 1.5 万家，覆盖全国 29 个省份。

Wanchen Group has rapidly expanded through a franchise model, and relies on centralized procurement to achieve direct supply of approximately 95% of its products from brand owners, with average selling prices 20% to 30% lower than supermarkets and convenience stores. 万辰集团通过加盟模式快速扩张，并依托集中采购实现约 95% 商品由品牌方直供，平均售价较超市、便利店低 20% 至 30%。

The company emphasizes that its "good quality, not expensive" advantage is not reliant on low quality and low prices, but is achieved through improved supply chain efficiency. 该公司强调，其「好货不贵」优势并非依赖低质低价，而是通过供应链效率提升实现。

In terms of product strategy, Wanchen Group has launched two major private label series, "Haoxianglai Super Value" and "Haoxianglai Selection", focusing on extreme value for money and differentiated experiences, respectively. 在产品策略上，万辰集团推出「好想来超值」与「好想来甄选」两大自有品牌系列，分别主打极致质价比与差异化体验。

Among them, a natural drinking water with a retail price of 0.6 yuan has seen its single-month sales exceed 25 million bottles since its launch in May 2025. 其中，一款零售价 0.6 元的天然饮用水自 2025 年 5 月上市以来，单月销量突破 2500 万瓶。

According to the introduction, Wanchen Group's self-developed digital system covers the entire chain of site selection, procurement, warehousing, logistics, and store operations, and improves the survival rate of new stores through AI intelligent site selection. In the first half of 2025, the closure rate of franchised stores was only 1.9%, significantly lower than the industry average. 据介绍，万辰集团自研的数字化系统覆盖选址、采购、仓储、物流及门店运营全链路，并通过 AI 智能选址提升新店存活率。2025 年上半年，加盟店闭店率仅为 1.9%，远低于行业平均水平。

item.title: 《无主之地 4》Switch 2 版无限期延迟发售，预购已取消
item.guid: 《无主之地-4》Switch-2-版无限期延迟发售，预购已取消
item.description:
Gearbox officially announced today on the X platform that the Switch 2 version of "Borderlands 4" will be postponed indefinitely, and the original release plan for October 3 has been canceled. Gearbox 官方今日在 X 平台宣布，《无主之地 4》Switch 2 版本将无限期推迟发售，原定的 10 月 3 日上市计划已被取消。

Gearbox stated in the announcement: Gearbox 在声明中表示：

We need to inform everyone that the release of "Borderlands 4" for Switch 2 will be delayed. This was not a decision made lightly, but we want to provide players with the best possible experience, and the game still requires additional development and polishing time. Our goal is for this release to better align with the inclusion of cross-platform save functionality.

Affected by Nintendo eShop policies, all digital pre-orders will be automatically canceled on September 26, and users can also choose to cancel them earlier. 受任天堂 eShop 政策影响，所有数字预购将于 9 月 26 日自动取消，用户也可自行提前操作。

As for physical pre-orders, players need to contact retailers to confirm subsequent arrangements. 至于实体版预购，玩家需联系零售商确认后续安排。

Currently, Gearbox has not announced a new release date. 目前 Gearbox 尚未公布新的发售日期。

Wccftech reported that, considering the PC and console versions are still undergoing extensive fixes and optimizations, the Switch 2 version might be delayed until 2026 before it can be launched. Wccftech 报道认为，考虑到 PC 与主机版本仍在进行大量修复与优化，Switch 2 版或将推迟至 2026 年才有可能上线。

item.title: 《成为大师》定档 10 月 18 日
item.guid: 《成为大师》定档-10-月-18-日
item.description:
The documentary film "Becoming a Master" announced its release date, set to hit cinemas nationwide on October 18, simultaneously releasing its "Nameless" version trailer and poster. 纪录片电影《成为大师》宣布定档，将于 10 月 18 日全国上映，并同步发布「无名」版定档预告与海报。

Directed by Zhao Lin, the film focuses on three original painters from Dafen Village in Shenzhen – Master Pang, Yifan, and Dongtian – who, amidst a thriving industry of replicating famous paintings, insist on their original artistic path. Facing high rents and real-life pressures, they still choose to depict their own pure poetry on canvas. 影片由赵林执导，故事聚焦深圳大芬村三位原创画家庞大师、一凡、冬天，他们在名画仿制产业盛行的环境中，坚持走原创之路。面对高昂房租与现实压力，他们依旧选择在画布上描绘属于自己的纯粹诗意。

It is reported that the film took 5 years to complete. Director Zhao Lin lived in Dafen Village for 8 months, authentically documenting the painters' solitude and perseverance. 据悉，影片历时 5 年创作完成，导演赵林曾深入大芬村生活 8 个月，真实记录了画家们的孤独与坚持。

"Becoming a Master" is jointly produced by Shanghai Zhenyi Film and Television Culture Studio, Beijing Xinzhao Pictures, and others, and will officially be released in cinemas nationwide on October 18. 《成为大师》由上海振艺影视文化工作室、北京新照影业等联合出品，将于 10 月 18 日正式登陆全国院线。

item.title: 《下一个台风》定档 10 月 25 日
item.guid: 《下一个台风》定档-10-月-25-日
item.description:
The film "The Next Typhoon" officially announced its release date today, set to hit cinemas nationwide on October 25, simultaneously releasing its trailer and poster. 电影《下一个台风》今日官宣定档，将于 10 月 25 日登陆全国院线，并同步发布定档预告与海报。

Directed by Li Yu, the film stars Zhang Zifeng and Zhang Weili, with Angelica Lee making a special appearance and Yao Chen joining as a special guest. 影片由李玉执导，张子枫、张伟丽领衔主演，李心洁特别出演，姚晨特邀加盟。

The story focuses on the real-life struggles of women, telling how urban girl Lin Momo (played by Zhang Zifeng), after being assaulted at a graduation party, unexpectedly meets mute girl Axi (played by Zhang Weili) in a fishing village. The two support each other, jointly resisting the "typhoon of life." 故事聚焦女性现实困境，讲述城市女孩林沫沫（张子枫 饰）在毕业聚会中遭受侵害后，意外与失语女孩阿汐（张伟丽 饰）在渔村相遇，两人彼此支撑，共同抵御「人生台风」。

It is reported that "The Next Typhoon" has a runtime of 96 minutes, is jointly produced by Zhejiang Culture and Film Group, Beijing Laurel Films, Shanghai Maoyan Pictures, and other companies, and will officially be released on October 25. 据悉，《下一个台风》片长 96 分钟，由浙文影业集团、北京劳雷影业、上海猫眼影业等多家公司联合出品，将于 10 月 25 日正式上映。

item.title: 《日掛中天》官宣定档 11 月 7 日
item.guid: 《日掛中天》官宣定档-11-月-7-日
item.description:
The film "Sun in the Zenith" officially announced its release date today, set to hit cinemas nationwide on November 7, simultaneously releasing its "Sea of Hatred, Sky of Love" version trailer and "Can't Live Without You" version poster. 电影《日掛中天》今日正式宣布定档，将于 11 月 7 日在全国上映，并同步发布「恨海情天」版定档预告与「离不开你」版定档海报。

Directed by Cai Shangjun, the film stars Xin Zhilei, Zhang Songwen, and Feng Shaofeng. After its premiere in Venice, the film received excellent reviews, with the jury praising Xin Zhilei for "portraying a volcanic eruption of female emotions with extreme restraint." 该片由蔡尚君执导，辛芷蕾、张颂文、冯绍峰领衔主演，影片在威尼斯首映后口碑不俗，评审团盛赞辛芷蕾「以极致的克制演绎出女性情感如火山般的喷发」。

Overseas media also gave high praise. "Variety" stated that Zhang Songwen "deconstructed the tragic narrative with a performance full of common touch," while "Screen Daily" believed the film "perfectly blends regional cultural symbols with universal human emotions." 海外媒体同样给予高度评价，《Variety》称张颂文「用充满市井气息的表演解构了悲情叙事」，《Screen Daily》则认为影片「将地域文化符号与人类共通情感完美融合」。

According to previous reports, "Sun in the Zenith" has been confirmed to be shortlisted for the "Pingyao Surprise" section of the 9th Pingyao International Film Festival and will have its China premiere on September 25. 据此前报道，《日掛中天》已确认入围第九届平遥国际电影展「平遥惊喜」单元，并将在 9 月 25 日迎来中国首映。
